## Create Your Customized Flowcharts with Ease - Streamline Your Workflow Effortlessly


## 


### ① Simplified Flowcharts and Mind Maps - Lighten Your Workload


Gone are the days of manually shaping every element in your edgeless mode mind maps or flowcharts and linking them together. With a single click, our new feature allows shapes to automatically extend from one another, saving you time and energy and making the process more convenient.









![q1kRb852K7CyMTlg9CXig9gOklaMKSlob1bGxmyH11k=](/blobs/q1kRb852K7CyMTlg9CXig9gOklaMKSlob1bGxmyH11k=)





### ② Tailor Your Workflow - Explore a Spectrum of Options


To elevate your flowchart experience, we offer shape customization options, including colors and styles. Click to create a new shape, and watch it harmonize seamlessly with the previous one, giving you a cohesive toolkit to play with.



![ndYv530Fmd8nIV8PHF_XOI1aj477zMkeAS-kuPxZRG8=](/blobs/ndYv530Fmd8nIV8PHF_XOI1aj477zMkeAS-kuPxZRG8=)


## Effortless Presentation - Elevate Your Work's Visual Impact with Ease





### ① Frame Your Ideas - Showcase Specific Sections with Precision


Have you ever felt like making a PowerPoint was a bit of a hassle? First get all your stuff ready, then open up the software, make a slide, and mess around with the layout. It can be a real chore. But guess what? We've made things way easier. In edgeless mode, you can now just create your content and easily make frames (kind of like slides) in any area you want. No more complication. Your presentation is good to go!
